sources.title: The Satan Bug (1964) George Maharis Â· Richard Basehart
sources.description: The efforts of a secret agent to recover a bacteriological weapon that threatens humanity, stolen from a research station. Science fiction fantasy in a realistic package and perfectly staged..

metadata.Plot: A germ warfare lab has had an accident. The first theory is that one of the nasty germs has gotten free and killed several scientists. The big fear is that a more virulent strain, named The Satan Bug because all life can be killed off by it should it escape, may have been stolen.
metadata.Writer: Alistair MacLean, James Clavell, Edward Anhalt
metadata.Actors: George Maharis, Richard Basehart, Anne Francis
